mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, s_name, s_province, s_city, s_area, s_flowers from u_school where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into u_school(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, s_name, s_province, s_city, s_area, s_flowers) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{sName}, #{sProvince}, #{sCity}, #{sArea}, #{sFlowers})

insert into u_school(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, s_name, s_province, s_city, s_area, s_flowers) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.sName}, #{entity.sProvince}, #{entity.sCity}, #{entity.sArea}, #{entity.sFlowers})

insert into u_school(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, s_name, s_province, s_city, s_area, s_flowers) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.sName}, #{entity.sProvince}, #{entity.sCity}, #{entity.sArea}, #{entity.sFlowers})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), s_name = values(s_name), s_province = values(s_province), s_city = values(s_city), s_area = values(s_area), s_flowers = values(s_flowers)
mapper.update:
update u_school
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
s_name = #{sName},
s_province = #{sProvince},
s_city = #{sCity},
s_area = #{sArea},
s_flowers = #{sFlowers},
where id = #{id}
